name: GLAD VALAKAS SIMULATOR
description:
GLAD VALAKAS SIMULATOR is a game about the most famous Russian streamer. You need to live 10 days in the image for the protagonist of the game.
- 4 mini-games with endless gameplay
- Interesting soundtrack
- Every day a new anecdote and a new series about a lawyer
- Steam Achievements
Control in mini-games: space bar, arrows
Coming soon: Trading Cards
Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5!
